sources.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea (1954)
sources.description: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/20000-leagues-under-the-sea-1954/

sources.title: 20,000 Leagues Under The Sea | FULL MOVIE | 1997 | Action, Adventure
sources.description:
Young oceanographer becomes a passenger on a futuristic submarine designed and run by a brilliant but eccentric scientist/recluse who plans to repopulate Atlantis.

Richard Crenna, Ben Cross, Julie Cox, Michael Jayston, Paul Gross, Jeff Harding, David Henry

Directed by Michael Anderson
1997

metadata.Plot: The oceans during the late 1800s are no longer safe; many ships have been lost. Sailors have returned to port with stories of a vicious narwhal (a giant whale with a long horn) which sinks their ships. A naturalist, Professor (Pierre) Aronnax, his assistant, Conseil, and a professional whaler, Ned Land, join a US expedition which attempts to unravel the mystery.
metadata.Actors: Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas
